mapper.select: select open_id as "openId", card_no as "cardNo", nick_name1 as "nickName1", head_imgurl as "headImgurl" from xx_wechat_binding a where a.open_id=#{openId} and channel = "doooly"

select card_no cardNo, open_id openId, password password, status status, head_imgurl headImgurl, nick_name1 nickName1, last_open_id lastOpenId, channel channel from xx_wechat_binding bind where (bind.card_no in (#{memberCardNums}) or bind.card_no in (#{memberMobiles})) and bind.nick_name1 is not null and bind.nick_name1 !='' and bind.nick_name1 !='null'
